Key Match Events: Brazil won 1-0 at home over Ecuador, the goal was scored by Rodrygo at minute 30'.
Four minutes of added time will be played in the second half.
Pre-Game Insights: Kevin Rodríguez, the 24 year old center forward is currently playing for Club Union St. Gilloise of Belgium, he has played six games so far in the South American Qualifiers for the 2026 World Cup and in the total of games he has already scored one assist and one goal, this one against Bolivia.

Rodrygo, the 23-year-old center forward is currently playing for Club Real Madrid of Spain. He has played six matches in the current edition of the South American Qualifiers for the 2026 World Cup and in the total number of matches he has not been able to assist, but he has already scored two goals, against Bolivia on two occasions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Major Antônio Couto Pereira Stadium in the city of Curitiba (Brazil).
The match will not be broadcast live on TV.
